original_text: And David abode in the wilderness in strong holds, and remained in a mountain in the wilderness of Ziph. And Saul sought him every day, but God delivered him not into his hand.
korean_text: 다윗이 광야의 요새에도 있었고 또 십 광야 산골에도 머물렀으므로 사울이 매일 찾되 하나님이 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: And David abode in the wilderness in strong holds
and remained in a mountain in the wilderness of Ziph
And Saul sought him every day
but God delivered him not into his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님은 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 않으셨다
